text: The January 2016 East Asia cold wave was a cold weather system that covered East Asia. Eighty-five people from Taiwan died due to the cold temperatures. There were six deaths in Japan from the winter storms. Four people in China died from gas poisoning. Category:2016 in Asia Category:2016 in weather Category:2016 disasters in Asia Category:Deadly storms Category:East Asia East Asia cold wave
title: January 2016 East Asia cold wave
